QuestData.Title: Return Fire
QuestData.Description: The fires are mostly contained, but we have to do something about those wind riders!$B$BQuick, $n, you have to jump into one of our glaive throwers and return fire!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use an Astranaar Thrower to shoot down 15 Hellscream's Hellions & their Watch Wind Riders.
QuestData.RewardText: We're saved! You've shot down enough of them that we should be able to handle the rest.$B$BI cannot thank you enough, $n.
